H0.text: What word best describes a triangle where all sides are equal. Isosceles

H1.text: What word best describes a triangle where all sides are equal. Regular

H2.text: What word best describes a triangle where all sides are equal. Uniform

H3.text: What word best describes a triangle where all sides are equal. Equilateral

A4.text: An equilateral triangle is a triangle in which all three sides have the same length, and all three angles are equal.

A5.text: Because of these properties, the equilateral triangle is a regular polygon.

A6.text: A triangle whose sides are all the same length is an equilateral triangle.
